strength_details: Clear BI/ETL responsibilities with specific tool requirements (Cognos, DataStage)
Established enterprise company (IBM) with global delivery center experience
Focused data engineering role without scope creep into other disciplines
concern_details: Heavy reliance on legacy tools (Cognos, DataStage) with no modern stack mentioned
Onsite requirement in Pune with 'relentless focus on quality' suggests potential for overtime
No reporting structure or manager level specified
Limited growth signals with no career path or learning opportunities mentioned
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers (3+ years) with BI/DW experience seeking stable enterprise roles
Candidates with Cognos and DataStage expertise looking for traditional ETL roles
Engineers comfortable with legacy technology stacks in large enterprise environments
probe_details: Ask about actual team size and seniority mix in the Pune delivery center
Clarify reporting structure and manager level
Understand typical work hours and overtime expectations
Inquire about tech debt and modernization plans for existing systems
leverage_details: Cognos Developer/Admin experience is a key differentiator for this role
BI/DW project experience with at least 2 reporting/visualization projects is required
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers with BI/DW experience seeking enterprise roles at IBM. Clear responsibilities focused on Cognos and ETL tools, but limited modern tech stack and growth signals. Main trade-offs are legacy technology and potential for overtime in onsite environment.
